Runs of Homozygoisty

```{bash}
plink --file RISG.ROH --homozyg --homozyg-gap 1000 --homozyg-density 50 --homozyg-window-snp 100 --homozyg-window-threshold 0.05 --recode --out RISG.ROH
```

```{r}
Coverage <- read.csv("SIM.hom", sep = "") %>%
  summarize (Coverage = sum(KB), SNPs = sum(NSNP)) %>%
  .[1]
ROH <- read.csv("RISG.ROH.hom", sep = "") %>%
  mutate(FID = recode(FID, FI = 'CL1', NEH = 'CL2')) %>%
  mutate(Type = ifelse(FID == "CL1" | FID == "CL2", "Commercial", "Wild")) %>%
  group_by(Type,FID,IID) %>%
  summarize(LROH = sum(KB)) %>%
  mutate(FROH = LROH/Coverage$Coverage)
```

```{r}
ROH_aov <-aov(ROH$FROH ~ ROH$FID)
TukeyHSD(ROH_aov)
```

```{r}
ROH_plot <- ggplot(ROH, aes(x=FID, y=FROH, fill=Type))+
  geom_boxplot()+
  xlab("Population")+
  ylab("Fraction of Genome in ROH")+
  ggtitle("Runs of Homozygoisty")
plot(ROH_plot)
```
